userStoryASummary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to wear small, simple, and comfortable health sensors to continuously track my progress and stay motivated to challenge myself with harder exercises.
userStoryBSummary: As an older person I want to completely block system monitoring of my recovery to protect my privacy and avoid feeling controlled.
resolutionDescription: Both user stories are adjusted to allow conditional monitoring respecting privacy preferences, enabling selective data collection with user consent and configurable feedback.
